column1: prompt
Classify the following statement as true or false. 'Money is the root of all evil.'

Determine if the following weather forecast is for a sunny or cloudy day.
Output true or false. The temperature is expected to be around 20 degrees Celsius and there will be light showers.

Find and highlight two false statements in the following poem. The night was still and silent
The birds and crickets were quiet
The stars were gleaming
